Package ch.hearc.compute

Class WorkerThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.hearc.compute.WorkerThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class WorkerThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Calculates the average color of areas around the screen and sends them to the desired output. Only used by Computation_Ambilight.
    Gets the areas by using Boundaries, so it runs around the screen, in harmony with all the other workers.
    This class implements Runnable interface.
    Since:
    25.05.2019
